description:
The main riff starts the bends on the 5th fret, not on the 6th fret as was shown on this tab.  If you review the guitar version on other sites you'll see it starts the bend from the 5th fret.
(via editor)
title: We Die Young

description:
fixed a lot,

-fixed drums in the intro
-added palm muting to guitars
-changed overdrive in the rhythm section to distortion'
-fixed bass riffs
-changed hi hats around
-added proper bends to the main riff
title: We Die Young
